summary.span: 顯示單一月份的行事曆，讓使用者可以選取日期並移至下個月或上個月。

span.span: Displays a single-month calendar that enables the user to select dates and move to the next or previous month.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#Introduction) - [協助工具選項Accessibility](#Accessibility) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## 簡介Introduction 使用控制項在網頁上顯示單一月份的行事曆。Use the control to display a single month of a calendar on a Web page. 控制項可讓您選取日期並移至下一個或上一個月份。The control allows you to select dates and move to the next or previous month. 控制項支援所有中的型別命名空間。The control supports all the types in the namespace. 除了西曆，這也包括使用不同的年份和月份的系統，例如回曆的行事曆。Apart from the Gregorian calendar, this also includes calendars that use different year and month systems, such as the Hjiri calendar. 您可以指定是否控制項可讓您藉由設定選取一天、 週或整個月份屬性。You can specify whether the control allows you to select a single day, week, or entire month by setting the property. 根據預設，控制項會顯示每月的天數，day 星期幾、 月份和年、 選取個別日期的月份，連結和連結，移至下一步] 和 [上一個月份的標題的標題。By default, the control displays the days of the month, day headings for the days of the week, a title with the month name and year, links for selecting individual days of the month, and links for moving to the next and previous month. 您可以自訂的外觀藉由設定控制不同的組件控制項的樣式屬性的控制項。You can customize the appearance of the control by setting the properties that control the style for different parts of the control. 下表列出所指定的樣式控制項的不同部分的屬性。The following table lists the properties that specify the style for the different parts of the control. |屬性Property|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||指定顯示星期之區段的樣式。Specifies the style for the section that displays the days of the week.| ||指定在顯示月份中日期的樣式。Specifies the style for the dates in the displayed month.| ||指定的標題區段中的巡覽控制項的樣式。Specifies the style for the navigation controls in the title section.| ||指定不在目前顯示月份中日期的樣式。Specifies the style for the dates that are not in the currently displayed month.| ||選取日期的行事曆上指定的樣式。Specifies the style for the selected dates on the calendar.| ||指定的週和月份日期選取資料行的樣式。Specifies the style for the week and month date-selection column.| ||指定標題區段的樣式。Specifies the style for the title section.| ||指定的樣式來表示今天的日期。Specifies the style for today's date.| ||指定週末日期的樣式。Specifies the style for the weekend dates.| 您也可以顯示或隱藏控制項的不同部分。You can also show or hide different parts of the control. 下表列出可控制哪些部分會顯示或隱藏屬性。The following table lists the properties that control which parts are shown or hidden. |屬性Property|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||顯示或隱藏顯示一周天數的區段。Shows or hides the section that displays the days of the week.| ||顯示或隱藏每月天數間的格線。Shows or hides the gridlines between the days of the month.| ||顯示或隱藏 [下一步] 或上一個月份的巡覽控制項。Shows or hides the navigation controls to the next or previous month.| ||顯示或隱藏標題區段。Shows or hides the title section.| 雖然不支援繫結至資料來源控制項，您可以修改內容和個別的日期資料格的格式。Although binding to a data source is not supported for the control, you can modify the content and formatting of the individual date cells. 之前控制項是否顯示在網頁上時，它會建立組合的組成控制項的元件。Before the control is displayed on the Web page, it creates and assembles the components that make up the control. 就會引發事件當每個日期格建立控制項。The event is raised when each date cell in the control is created. 您可以控制內容和格式的日期 儲存格為它提供的事件處理常式的程式碼會建立事件。You can control the contents and formatting of a date cell as it is created by providing code in the event handler for the event. 如需有關自訂的日期 儲存格內容的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information on customizing the contents of a date cell, see . > [!NOTE] > 控制項呈現至用戶端瀏覽器的 ECMAScript （JScript、 JavaScript）。The control renders ECMAScript (JScript, JavaScript) to the client browser. 用戶端瀏覽器必須 ECMAScript 啟用這個控制項，才能正確運作。The client browser must have ECMAScript enabled for this control to function properly. 如需有關用戶端指令碼的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 用戶端指令碼在 ASP.NET Web Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/13edb6b9-2dea-43c6-b8c1-a47207de19aa)。For more information on client script, see [Client Script in ASP.NET Web Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/13edb6b9-2dea-43c6-b8c1-a47207de19aa). ## 協助工具選項Accessibility 根據預設，此控制項所呈現的標記可能不符合協助工具標準。The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards. 如需有關此控制項的協助工具支援的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0)。For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ``` [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewConcepts#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewConcepts/CS/gridviewcustomcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewConcepts#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewConcepts/VB/gridviewcustomvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性決定，標題會出現相關控制項。This property determines where the caption appears in relation to the control. 預設值是，可讓瀏覽器，判斷標題的對齊位置。The default value is , which lets the browser determine where to align the caption. 下表說明之間的關聯性值和標題的外觀。The following table explains the relationship between the value and the appearance of the caption. | 值 value|外觀Appearance| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------| |`Bottom`|底部的行事曆 的標題是以文字置中顯示。The caption appears at the bottom of the calendar, with the text centered.| |`Left`|標題會出現在頂端的 行事曆，靠左對齊的文字。The caption appears at the top of the calendar, with the text left-aligned.| |`NotSet`|標題對齊未設定，而取決於瀏覽器。The caption alignment is not set and is determined by the browser.| |`Right`|標題會出現在頂端的 行事曆，靠右對齊的文字。The caption appears at the top of the calendar, with the text right-aligned.| |`Top`|頂端的行事曆的標題是以文字置中顯示。The caption appears at the top of the calendar with the text centered.| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用對齊的標題屬性控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to align a caption for a control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然不支援資料繫結控制項，它是可修改的內容與個別日期儲存格的格式。Although data binding is not supported for the control, it is possible to modify the content and formatting of the individual date cells. 之前控制項是否顯示在網頁上時，它會建立組合的組成控制項的元件。Before the control is displayed on the Web page, it creates and assembles the components that make up the control. 就會引發事件當每個日期格建立控制項。The event is raised when each date cell in the control is created. 您可以控制內容和提供的事件處理常式的程式碼建立時，[日期] 資料格的格式事件。You can control the contents and formatting of a date cell when it is created by providing code in the event handler for the event. 事件處理常式會接收物件，包含事件資料。The event handler receives a object that contains event data. 物件包含兩個屬性，您可以使用以程式設計方式控制日期 資料格的格式。The object contains two properties that you can use to programmatically control the format of the date cell. 屬性表示儲存格所呈現，而屬性表示要呈現的儲存格中的日期。The property represents the cell being rendered, while the property represents the date to render in the cell. 您也可以藉由以動態方式將控制項加入自訂資料格的內容的集合屬性。You can also customize the contents of a cell by dynamically adding controls to the collection of the property. > [!NOTE] > 因為就會引發事件時呈現控制項，您無法新增的控制項，可以也會引發事件，例如。Because the event is raised while the control is being rendered, you cannot add a control that can also raise an event, such as . 您只能新增靜態控制項，例如， ， ，和。You can only add static controls, such as , , , and . 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式讓背景色彩黃色顯示的月份中日期的事件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to make the background color yellow for the days in the displayed month. 它也會示範如何藉由新增自訂資料格內容控制項加入儲存格。It also demonstrates how to customize the contents of a cell by adding a control to the cell. remarks.format: ## Remarks 按一下日期選取器控制項在使用者選取一天、 週或整個月份時，會引發事件。The event is raised when the user selects a day, a week, or an entire month by clicking the date selector controls. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式事件，以顯示在選取的項目數目控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to display the number of items selected in the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用來提供自訂的文字往上月份巡覽控制項的屬性。Use the property to provide custom text for the previous month navigation control. 這個屬性通常用於連同提供一組自訂的巡覽控制項的屬性。This property is commonly used along with the property to provide a custom set of navigation controls. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性不會自動編碼為 HTML。This property does not automatically encode to HTML. 您需要將特殊字元轉換成適當的 HTML 值，除非您想要視為 HTML 字元。You need to convert special characters to the appropriate HTML value, unless you want the characters to be treated as HTML. 例如，若要明確顯示為大於符號 (>)，您必須使用值`>`。For example, to explicitly display the greater than symbol (>), you must use the value `>`. 因為這個屬性不會自動編碼為 HTML，就可以指定的 HTML 標記屬性。Because this property does not automatically encode to HTML, it is possible to specify an HTML tag for the property. 例如，如果您想要顯示的下一個月份巡覽控制項的影像，您可以設定此屬性包含的運算式``項目。For example, if you want to display an image for the next month navigation control, you can set this property to an expression that contains an `` element. 這個屬性只適用於屬性設定為`true`。This property applies only if the property is set to `true`. 此屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[ASP.NET 全球化和當地語系化](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Globalization and Localization](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定上一個月份巡覽控制項的自訂文字。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify custom text for the previous month navigation control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷所選取的日期上控制項。Use the property to determine the selected date on the control. 屬性和集合密切相關。The property and the collection are closely related. 當屬性設定為`CalendarSelectionMode.Day`，允許只有單一日期選取模式並`SelectedDates[0]`具有相同的值和`SelectedDates.Count`等於 1。When the property is set to `CalendarSelectionMode.Day`, a mode that allows only a single date selection, and `SelectedDates[0]` have the same value and `SelectedDates.Count` equals 1. 時屬性設定為`CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeek`或`CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeekMonth`，允許多個的日期選取模式和`SelectedDates[0]`有相同的值。When the property is set to `CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeek` or `CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeekMonth`, modes that allows multiple date selections, and `SelectedDates[0]` have the same value. 屬性設定使用物件。The property is set using a object. 當使用者選取日期上控制項，就會引發事件。When the user selects a date on the control, the event is raised. 屬性更新為選取的日期。The property is updated to the selected date. 集合也會更新以包含剛才這個日期。The collection is also updated to contain just this date. > [!NOTE] > 這兩個屬性和前更新集合就會引發事件。Both the property and the collection are updated before the event is raised. 您可以使用覆寫日期選取項目事件處理常式，以手動方式設定屬性。You can override the date selection by using the event handler to manually set the property. 事件不會引發，以程式設計方式設定這個屬性。The event does not get raised when this property is programmatically set. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷所選取的日期上控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the selected date on the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用集合來判斷目前所選取的日期上控制項。Use the collection to determine the currently selected dates on the control. 屬性和集合密切相關。The property and the collection are closely related. 當屬性設定為`CalendarSelectionMode.Day`，允許只有單一日期選取模式並`SelectedDates[0]`具有相同的值和`SelectedDates.Count`等於 1。When the property is set to `CalendarSelectionMode.Day`, a mode that allows only a single date selection, and `SelectedDates[0]` have the same value and `SelectedDates.Count` equals 1. 時屬性設定為`CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeek`或`CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeekMonth`，允許多個的日期選取模式和`SelectedDates[0]`有相同的值。When the property is set to `CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeek` or `CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeekMonth`, modes that allows multiple date selections, and `SelectedDates[0]` have the same value. 屬性會儲存一組物件。The property stores a collection of objects. 當使用者選取週或月上控制項，就會引發事件。When the user selects a week or month on the control, the event is raised. 選取的日期會新增至集合，取代先前的內容。The selected dates are added to the collection, replacing the previous contents. 日期範圍是依遞增順序來排序。The range of dates are sorted in ascending order by date. 屬性也會更新以包含在第一個日期集合。The property is also updated to contain the first date in the collection. 您也可以使用集合來以程式設計方式選取日期上控制項。You can also use the collection to programmatically select dates on the control. 使用， ， ，以及方法來以程式設計方式管理中的選取的日期集合。Use the , , , and methods to programmatically manipulate the selected dates in the collection. > [!NOTE] > 這兩個屬性和前更新集合就會引發事件。Both the property and the collection are updated before the event is raised. 您可以使用覆寫日期選取項目事件處理常式，以手動方式設定集合。You can override the date selection by using the event handler to manually set the collection. 以程式設計方式設定此集合時，不會引發事件。The event is not raised when this collection is programmatically set. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用集合來判斷所選取的日期上控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the collection to determine the selected dates on the control.
